div:
<a class="pattern-relateditems-result-select<% if (selectable) { %> selectable<% } %><% if (oneLevelUp) { %> one-level-up<% } %>" data-path="<%- path %>">
<span class="pattern-relateditems-result-title<%- portal_type ? ' contenttype-' + portal_type.toLowerCase() : '' %><%- review_state ? ' state-' + review_state : '' %>" title="<%- portal_type %>"><%- Title %> <%- path %>
<% if (is_folderish) { %> <a class="pattern-relateditems-result-browse" data-path="<%- path %>" title="<%- open_folder %>"><span class="<% if (oneLevelUp) { %>icon-left-circle<% } else { %>icon-right-circle<% } %>"> <% } %>
